SELECT au.id, au.username, au.nickname, au.user_type, sf.file_url AS avatarUrl, ar.id AS roleId, ar.role_name, ar.role_code, ap.id AS permissionId, ap.parent_id, ap.menu_name, ap.menu_url, ap.permissions, ap.menu_type, ap.icon, ap.sort FROM auth_user au LEFT JOIN auth_user_role aur ON au.id = aur.user_id LEFT JOIN auth_role ar ON aur.role_id = ar.id LEFT JOIN auth_role_permission arp ON ar.id = arp.role_id LEFT JOIN auth_permission ap ON arp.permission_id = ap.id LEFT JOIN sys_file sf ON au.avatar = sf.id WHERE au.id = ${id} AND aur.del_flag = 1 AND ar.del_flag = 1 AND arp.del_flag = 1 AND ap.del_flag = 1
